summary: I AM EXPERIENCING ISSUES WITH MY STEERING CONTROL AND POWERING STEERING LEAKING WHICH HAS CAUSED A UNIQUE NOISE ON SHARP TURNS AND WHILE DRIVING IN GENERAL. MY MECHANIC INFORMED ME THAT MY RACK AND PINIONS NEED TO BE REPLACED. MY 2005 RX 330 CURRENTLY HAS 131,000 MILES. IT'S VERY SAD TO READ PREVIOUS COMPLAINTS AND LEXUS STILL HAS NOT DONE ANYTHING ABOUT THIS ISSUE. THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM THAT LEXUS IS AWARE OF - WHAT THE HELL!
